title: Understanding Data Collection
text: Data collection is a systematic approach to gathering and measuring information from various sources to get a complete and accurate picture of an area of interest.

title: Identifying Primary Data Collection Methods
text: Which of the following is a primary data collection method used in research?

title: Definition of Interviews
text: Interviews involve direct interaction between the researcher and the participant, allowing for in-depth data collection.

title: Exploring Secondary Data Collection Methods
text: Which of the following is a secondary data collection method?

title: Definition of Literature Review
text: A literature review involves analyzing existing research and publications to gather information on a specific topic.
